intro: Cynoglossum nobile, commonly known as the noble forget-me-not, is a herbaceous perennial plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. It features striking blue to purple flowers with a distinctive heart-shaped leaf structure. The plant typically grows to a height of 30–60 cm, with hairy stems and lanceolate leaves. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and prefers partial to full shade. Cynoglossum nobile is often cultivated in gardens for its ornamental value and historical use in herbal medicine.
